knimeNode.name: JaCoCo Adapter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Java Code Coverage (JaCoCo) Adapter. ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

intro.p: This node can be used to read data from JaCoCo coverage report(XML format). Only sourcefile are retrieved.

For further information about report generation please refer to JaCoCo documentation.
JaCoCo home page: http://www.eclemma.org/jacoco/

Please check workflow examples here or inside plugin jar.
Copyright (c) ImpressiveCode, DePress Project

fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file. When you press ENTER, the file is analyzed and the settings pre-set. You can also choose a previously read file from the drop-down list, or select a file from the "Browse..." dialog.

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the jacoco file.
